{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3194131,"name":"bobbysq","username":"bobbysq","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/bobbysq/{size}/195893_2.png","created_at":"2023-04-20T05:34:28.789Z","cooked":"

Yesterday, Imgur announced an update to their ToS effective May 19th mentioning that they will be deleting ‚Äúold, unused, and inactive content that is not tied to a user account‚Äù:

Imgur

Imgur Terms of Service Update [April 19, 2023]

We recently announced some changes to our Terms of Service that will be effective May 15, 2023. This help article aims to provide some clarifications on what this change entails and what those chan...

This heavily affects CD as a long-standing forum with a large back catalog of old, niche content that may have been hosted on Imgur. I don‚Äôt know what can be done to preserve posts that will be affected since editing is locked after 24 hours, but I encourage everyone to make backups of anything important they may have hosted on there that they would want to keep.

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":37,"updated_at":"2023-04-20T05:34:28.789Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":675,"reads":1035,"readers_count":1034,"score":3642.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":435165,"topic_slug":"psa-imgur-will-be-deleting-old-photos","display_username":"bobbysq","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://help.imgur.com/hc/en-us/articles/14415587638029/","internal":false,"reflection":false,"clicks":58},{"url":"https://www.chiefdelphi.com/t/google-is-deleting-all-inactive-accounts-accounts-without-a-login-in-over-2-years-starting-december-2023/437199","internal":true,"reflection":true,"title":"Google is deleting all "Inactive accounts" (accounts without a login in over 2 years) starting December 2023","clicks":5}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":4}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":28014,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"he/him"},"post_url":"/t/psa-imgur-will-be-deleting-old-photos/435165/1","custom_user_title":"he/him","reactions":[{"id":"angry","type":"emoji","count":10},{"id":"cry","type":"emoji","count":7},{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":4}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":21,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3194141,"name":"Zachary","username":"Zatack7","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/zatack7/{size}/175437_2.png","created_at":"2023-04-20T10:07:01.049Z","cooked":"

I understand why they have to do this, but it‚Äôs horrifying just how much history will be wiped away by this. Did they give a timeline for when the deletions will happen?

vladb:

Do you have an example we can try out?

1665 in 2018 should have images in the slides but not present in imgur

The Blue Alliance

Weapons of Mass Construction - Team 1665 (2018)

FIRST Robotics Competition team from Hudson, New York, USA.

So uh, ive been doing right click open image in new tab which hadn‚Äôt been working for me. Apparently, there are 2 links. If you click the hyperlink on the bottom of the page, it‚Äôs fine

","post_number":9,"post_type":1,"posts_count":37,"updated_at":"2023-04-20T12:39:53.844Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":8,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":667,"readers_count":666,"score":178.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":435165,"topic_slug":"psa-imgur-will-be-deleting-old-photos","display_username":"RoboGeek","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":2,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.thebluealliance.com/team/1665/2018","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Weapons of Mass Construction - Team 1665 (2018) - The Blue Alliance","clicks":2}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":33067,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Seeking Knowledge; Failed Programming"},"post_url":"/t/psa-imgur-will-be-deleting-old-photos/435165/9","custom_user_title":"Seeking Knowledge; Failed Programming","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3194195,"name":"Maia","username":"HarbringerOfAuroras","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/harbringerofauroras/{size}/165119_2.png","created_at":"2023-04-20T12:23:55.086Z","cooked":"

I think the admins will understand the need for preservation of old content. Frc and chief Delphi are a community that is centered on legacy, with many incedents living down in team memories. If things, like the Can Crossbows or game breaking robots like 469 in 2010, I think it would be devastating to inspiring new members. I think it is worth the server load to save such things.

","post_number":10,"post_type":1,"posts_count":37,"updated_at":"2023-04-20T12:23:55.086Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":8,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":627,"readers_count":626,"score":160.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":435165,"topic_slug":"psa-imgur-will-be-deleting-old-photos","display_username":"Maia","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":52180,"username":"vladb","name":"Vlad B","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/vladb/{size}/199590_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":51410,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"(She/They)"},"post_url":"/t/psa-imgur-will-be-deleting-old-photos/435165/10","custom_user_title":"(She/They)","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3194232,"name":"Vlad B","username":"vladb","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/vladb/{size}/199590_2.png","created_at":"2023-04-20T13:07:47.828Z","cooked":"
HarbringerOfAuroras:

I think it is worth the server load to save such things.

Oh, absolutely! But usually for such large scale projects it‚Äôs possible to get a database ‚Äúdump‚Äù (which is usually more optimized), so that we don‚Äôt need to make a large amount of requests over the network that overload the server.

vladb:

Skyehawk:

Yikes, wonder if TBA caches them‚Ä¶ Probably.

Hmm, seams pretty transparent to me.

image821√ó269 85.6 KB

Aaron_Li:

Some images show up on TBA but when clicked, the error pops up.

Do you have an example we can try out?

This is actually a problem on Imgur‚Äôs end with how it handles linking to certain old files. It‚Äôs a result of their ‚Äúnew‚Äù layout that they came out with a while back that broke a lot of things like this. As an imgur user, you could even have some images show up fine in your favorites but when you click on them it goes to that same 404 page. I think it has something to do with how the page redirects when you try to pull it up in a browser vs trying to view it via embedded image (I think Imgur does some sort of browser detection thing when you try to open certain links which affects how they appear).

Not sure if there‚Äôs a good way to fix it, but figured I‚Äôd mention the issue is likely not on the TBA end of things.

bobbysq:
Skyehawk:

Problem is re-linking will be an absolute pain, both for TBA and CD.

For CD at least the site has its own image hosting things can be moved to. I don‚Äôt know what TBA can do in this situation other than start running their own hosting and/or allowing direct links to images hosted on CD.

Technically speaking, this change appears to only affect content not associated with an Imgur user account (IE uploaded without logging in). Anyone could re-upload the content under a different user account and it would (theoretically) still stay on there forever. You can also upload images under an account and leave them as ‚Äúunlisted‚Äù so you can only get to them from direct links and they don‚Äôt appear to be associated with your account to anyone else.

For that matter, you could probably even make like a TBA Imgur account and find some way to just upload files onto that (though you might have to do this manually, Imgur does support batch uploads but not ‚Äúbot‚Äù uploads, as far as I know).
